summary: Fixed all bugs discovered during testing: 1) Gift card query bug (user_id vs purchased_by/redeemed_by), 2) Booking date/time parsing bug in cancellation fee calculation, 3) Store active validation bug (boolean comparison), 4) Push notification parameter name bug. All tests now passing 100%. System fully operational.
